long_description: The REI Journey waistpack comfortably carries essentials and keeps them at your fingertips for fast-moving urban adventures or quick jaunts down quiet trails. Padded back panel features a smooth air-mesh layer for ventilation. Panel-loading main compartment, front stretch-mesh pocket, side mesh pockets, hipbelt pockets, internal pocket and key leash make it easy to organize and access your gear. Hidden zippered pocket behind the back panel secures a passport, money and other valuables. Fits up to a 46" waist.
short_description: The REI Journey waistpack comfortably carries essentials and keeps them at your fingertips for fast-moving urban adventures or quick jaunts down quiet trails.
